title: Underground River Temple Adventure #48
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Temple Entrance Chamber
rooms.description: A vast stone chamber carved from living rock. The sound of rushing water echoes from deeper within the temple. Ancient columns support the vaulted ceiling, covered in glowing phosphorescent moss. Stone carvings depict priests performing rituals by a sacred river. The air is cool and damp, and water drips steadily from stalactites above.

items.name: carved stone pedestal
items.description: A weathered pedestal with offerings and ceremonial items

items.name: ancient bronze key
items.description: A key with water symbols etched into its surface

items.name: offering cabinet
items.description: A stone cabinet with three compartments for ritual offerings

items.name: temple foundation stone
items.description: A stone tablet with carved text
items.text: This Sacred Temple of the Underground River was consecrated in the year 1247 by High Priest Akara. The Sacred River flows eternal beneath our feet, source of all life and wisdom. Only the faithful may enter the Inner Sanctum.

items.name: ornate silver key
items.description: A silver key decorated with flowing water patterns

items.name: ancient wall carvings
items.description: Detailed carvings showing the temple's history
items.text: The carvings depict High Priest Akara discovering the Sacred River and building this temple. Priests are shown performing purification rituals in the Ritual Chamber. The final panel shows a treasure vault protected by three sacred questions.

items.name: ceremonial chest
items.description: A wooden chest bound with bronze fittings

items.name: priest's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal belonging to a temple priest
items.text: Day 89: High Priest Akara has taught us the three sacred truths. First, who founded our temple. Second, what flows beneath us giving life. Third, where the purification rituals are performed. These truths unlock the path to the treasure vault.

items.name: carved stone archway
items.description: An archway decorated with water motifs, leading deeper into the temple

rooms.name: Ritual Chamber
rooms.description: A circular chamber with a shallow pool of crystal-clear water at its center. The underground river can be heard rushing through channels beneath the floor. Stone basins line the walls, and ceremonial robes hang on hooks. Torches cast flickering light on murals depicting water rituals. A sealed door to the east leads to the treasure vault.

items.name: purification pool
items.description: A sacred pool fed by the underground river
items.text: The pool's water is remarkably clear and cold. An inscription on the rim reads: 'Here in the Ritual Chamber, the faithful are cleansed by the Sacred River's blessing.'

items.name: northern stone basin
items.description: A basin carved with symbols of flowing water

items.name: ritual instructions scroll
items.description: A scroll detailing temple ceremonies
items.text: PURIFICATION RITUAL: All who seek the temple's treasures must first be purified in the Ritual Chamber. High Priest Akara established these rites when he founded our order. The Sacred River provides the blessed water for our ceremonies.

items.name: priest's ceremonial robes
items.description: Elaborate robes hanging on the wall

items.name: hidden note
items.description: A small note tucked in the robe's pocket
items.text: Reminder: The vault door requires knowledge of three truths - our founder's name, the source of our sacred water, and the location of purification. Brother Marcus always forgets these simple facts!

items.name: ritual murals
items.description: Colorful murals showing priests performing ceremonies
items.text: The murals show High Priest Akara leading rituals in this very chamber. Priests pour water from the Sacred River over initiates. The final mural depicts the treasure vault, sealed and protected by sacred knowledge.

items.name: stone offering table
items.description: A table with various ritual implements and containers

items.name: sacred incense
items.description: Fragrant incense used in temple rituals

items.name: temple history scroll
items.description: A detailed account of the temple's founding
items.text: TEMPLE HISTORY: In 1247, High Priest Akara discovered the Sacred River flowing through these caverns. Recognizing its divine nature, he built this temple to honor the eternal waters. The Ritual Chamber was the first room completed, where all purification ceremonies take place.

items.name: sealed vault door
items.description: A massive stone door with three questions carved into its surface in glowing script. Water trickles down its face.

password_questions.question: Who founded this temple?
password_questions.hint: Check the temple inscription and the various scrolls about the temple's history

password_questions.question: What flows beneath the temple?
password_questions.hint: Multiple texts mention the source of the temple's sacred water

password_questions.question: Where are purification rituals performed?
password_questions.hint: The ritual scroll and temple history describe where ceremonies take place

rooms.name: Underground River Treasure Vault
rooms.description: You've reached the treasure vault! A magnificent chamber where the underground river flows through a channel carved in the floor. Ancient treasures line the walls - golden artifacts, jeweled chalices, and sacred relics. The sound of rushing water fills the space. At the far end, a natural tunnel follows the river's course, leading to daylight and freedom.

items.name: chests of temple treasures
items.description: Multiple chests filled with gold, gems, and sacred artifacts accumulated over centuries

items.name: ceremonial golden chalice
items.description: A magnificent chalice used in the most sacred rituals

items.name: underground river channel
items.description: The Sacred River flows through a carved channel, its waters sparkling in the torchlight
items.text: The river flows swiftly through the vault and into a natural tunnel. You can see daylight in the distance - the river emerges outside the mountain, offering a path to freedom!

items.name: display of sacred relics
items.description: Ancient religious artifacts and ceremonial items preserved for centuries

rooms.win_message: You have discovered the treasure vault and found the path to freedom! Following the underground river through the natural tunnel, you emerge into bright sunlight outside the mountain. The Sacred River flows peacefully beside you as you leave the ancient temple behind, its mysteries solved and its treasures discovered. You win!
